tables.name: FY24 Q1 Financial Summary Table
tables.unit_context: ($ in billions, except per share amounts)

yoy_change: Office Commercial products and cloud services revenue increased 15%
Office Consumer products and cloud services revenue increased 3%
Dynamics products and cloud services revenue increased 22%
Server products and cloud services revenue increased 21%
Azure and other cloud services growth of 29%
Windows Commercial products and cloud services revenue growth of 8%
Xbox content and services revenue increased 13%
Search and news advertising revenue excluding traffic acquisition costs increased 10%
fx_adjusted: Office Commercial products and cloud services revenue increased 14% (CC)
Office Consumer products and cloud services revenue increased 4% (CC)
Dynamics products and cloud services revenue increased 21% (CC)
Azure and other cloud services growth of 28% (CC)
Xbox content and services revenue increased 12% (CC)
Search and news advertising revenue excluding traffic acquisition costs increased 9% (CC)

metrics.yoy_change: Revenue grew 13%; Operating expenses grew 2%; Operating income grew 20%; Gross margin percentage increased roughly 1 point.
